npcs.name: Forest Ranger
dialogue: Welcome to the Northern Forest. I patrol these woods to keep travelers safe.
We've had reports of strange creatures deeper in the woods lately.
If you're planning to explore further north, make sure you're well prepared.
The abandoned cabin to the west belonged to an old herbalist. Might still be some useful supplies there.
Come back to my outpost if you need shelter during your travels.

npcs.name: Lost Merchant
dialogue: *looks nervous* Oh! Another person! Thank goodness!
I was traveling north with my goods when I got separated from my caravan.
Been hiding out in this cabin for days now. Too afraid to venture out alone.
If you're heading back to town, would you mind if I follow? I can pay you for your trouble.
Just... listen for a moment. Do you hear that? The woods seem to whisper at night...

hardcoded_items.name: Nature Spellbook
hardcoded_items.description: Channels the power of the forest to heal and protect.

dungeonEntrance.signMessage: Deep Forest Cave - Strange noises echo from within...
